Pre-Game Insights: Ireland emerged victorious against Pakistan by 5 wickets in the first T20I of the series.
Captain Babar Azam led Pakistan with 57 runs off 43 balls, supported by Saim Ayub’s 45 and Iftikhar Ahmed’s 37.
Ireland’s Andy Balbirnie scored 77 runs off 55 balls, while Harry Tector contributed 36 runs off 27 balls.
Pakistan’s Abbas Afridi was the leading wicket-taker with 2 wickets for 36 runs in 3.5 overs.
Ireland’s Craig Young was the pick of the bowlers with 2 wickets for 27 runs in 4 overs.
